pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ftsfThis package provides high-level interface to work with financial time series forecasting models.### InstallationTo install this package run command:> pip install ftsf### UsageThe usage of package is simple:> from ftsf.model import Model > from ftsf.preprocessing import get_data > x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test, scaler = get_data('AAPL', length=15) > model = Model('LSTM x2', lag = 15) > model.fit(x_train, y_train)> model.evaluate(x_test, y_test, scaler) {'mse' : 0.679, 'mae' : 0.8291, 'mape' : 0.00783, 'r2' : 0.98778}
